MongoDbSender
SendersEndpointMONGODB
Sender to perform action on a MongoDB database.
See also
Github - MongoDbSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.mongodb.MongoDbSender
Syntax
Copy
<MongoDbSender action=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
action	options	-
Action
Available Options: INSERTONE, INSERTMANY, FINDONE, FINDMANY, UPDATEONE, UPDATEMANY, DELETEONE, DELETEMANY
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
datasourceName	text	mongodb.datasource.default
The MongoDB datasource
database	text	-
Database to connect to. Can be overridden by parameter database
collection	text	-
Collection to act upon. Can be overridden by parameter collection
filter	text	-
Filter. Can contain references to parameters between ?{ and }. Can be overridden by parameter filter
limit	number	0
Limit to number of results returned. A value of 0 means 'no l
